resources.string: A lightweight scrobbler that submits information to Last.fm (and/or Libre.fm) on what music you play on your android phone. Last.fm then lets you view listening statistics and recommends new music you might like.

Supported apps: Android Music Player, HTC Hero/Sense Music Player, Google Music, Player Pro, Meridian Player, MixZing, Archos Music Player, Rhapsody Android, Vanilla Music Player, bTunes, Â³ (cubed), WIMP, Zimly, Just Playlists, PowerAMP, Winamp, myTouch 4G, RockOn, jukefox, DAAP Media Player, Folder Player, GoneMAD Music Player, MIUI Music Player, ServeStream, Sony Ericsson (Xperia) Music Player, Neutron Music Player, Music2Dance2, Rdio, DeaDBeeF, Music Pump XBMC Remote (Beta), JRTStudio Android Music Player, Apollo, LG Music Player, Now Playing, Shuttle Music Player, My Cloud Player, more...
